remarks: Properties of a pair of functions to be a closed walk (in an undirected graph) in terms of walks.  (Contributed by Alexander van der Vekens, 15-Mar-2018.)
statement: isclwlk0 $p |- ( ( ( V e. X /\ E e. Y ) /\ ( F e. W /\ P e. Z ) ) -> ( F ( V ClWalks E ) P <-> ( F ( V Walks E ) P /\ ( P ` 0 ) = ( P ` ( # ` F ) ) ) ) ) $.
